languages.text: "Это одна из технических построек. К счастью, на момент нападения здание пустовало, внутри нет заложников или невинных людей. Как по мне, то это был первый дом, который попался убийце на пути к отступлению. Мы успели перехватить остальных, но этот успел окопаться".

traits.locale_text: "Это одна из построек, отведенных под нужды Администратума. К счастью, на момент нападения здание пустовало, внутри нет заложников или невинных людей. Как по мне, то это был первый дом, который попался убийце на пути к отступлению. Мы успели перехватить остальных, но этот успел окопаться в здании".

languages.text: "It's one of the utility buildings. Fortunately, it was empty at the time of the attack — there were no potential hostages or innocent people inside. If you ask me, I think this was the first place the killer came to when he was beating his retreat. We managed to round up all the others, but this one holed himself up in there."
languages.original_text: "Это одна из технических построек. К счастью, на момент нападения здание пустовало, внутри нет заложников или невинных людей. Как по мне, то это был первый дом, который попался убийце на пути к отступлению. Мы успели перехватить остальных, но этот успел окопаться".

traits.locale_text: "It's one of the buildings given over for the Administratum's use. Fortunately, it was empty at the time of the attack — there were no potential hostages or innocent people inside. If you ask me, I think this was the first place the killer came to when he was beating his retreat. We managed to round up all the others, but this one holed himself up in there."

"It's one of the utility buildings. Fortunately, it was empty at the time of the attack — there were no potential hostages or innocent people inside. If you ask me, I think this was the first place the killer came to when he was beating his retreat. We managed to round up all the others, but this one holed himself up in there."

"It's one of the buildings given over for the Administratum's use. Fortunately, it was empty at the time of the attack — there were no potential hostages or innocent people inside. If you ask me, I think this was the first place the killer came to when he was beating his retreat. We managed to round up all the others, but this one holed himself up in there."

"It's one of the utility buildings. Fortunately, it was empty at the time of the attack — there were no potential hostages or innocent people inside. If you ask me, I think this was the first place the killer came to when he was beating his retreat. We managed to round up all the others, but this one holed himself up in there."

"It's one of the utility buildings. Fortunately, it was empty at the time of the attack — there were no potential hostages or innocent people inside. If you ask me, I think this was the first place the killer came to when he was beating his retreat. We managed to round up all the others, but this one holed himself up in there."

languages.text: 「公共施設のひとつです。幸い、襲撃時は中は空っぽでした。人質らしき者も、無実の人民もいませんでした。私の考えですが、殺人者は逃げているときにまずここへたどり着いたのではないかと。私達はどうにか犯人全員を一網打尽にしましたが、こいつだけがそこに隠れていたのです」
languages.original_text: "It's one of the utility buildings. Fortunately, it was empty at the time of the attack — there were no potential hostages or innocent people inside. If you ask me, I think this was the first place the killer came to when he was beating his retreat. We managed to round up all the others, but this one holed himself up in there."

traits.locale_text: 「公共施設のひとつです。幸い、襲撃時は中は空っぽでした。人質らしき者も、無実の人民もいませんでした。私の考えですが、殺人者は逃げているときにまずここへたどり着いたのではないかと。私達はどうにか犯人全員を一網打尽にしましたが、こいつだけがそこに隠れていたのです」

languages.text: “这座建筑是公共设施建筑。幸运的是，袭击发生的时候，里面空无一人，并没有潜在的人质或无辜人员。在我看来，那个刺客撤退的时候，直接撤到了这里。剩下的人我们全都解决掉了，但这家伙却躲到了这里面。”
languages.original_text: "It's one of the utility buildings. Fortunately, it was empty at the time of the attack — there were no potential hostages or innocent people inside. If you ask me, I think this was the first place the killer came to when he was beating his retreat. We managed to round up all the others, but this one holed himself up in there."

traits.locale_text: “这座建筑是公共设施建筑。幸运的是，袭击发生的时候，里面空无一人，并没有潜在的人质或无辜人员。在我看来，那个刺客撤退的时候，直接撤到了这里。剩下的人我们全都解决掉了，但这家伙却躲到了这里面。”

languages.text: «Este es uno de los edificios de suministros. Por suerte, estaba vacío cuando tuvo lugar el atentado y no había potenciales rehenes o gente inocente dentro. En mi opinión, fue el primer sitio al que acudió el asesino tras poner pies en polvorosa. Pudimos acorralar a todos los demás, pero este se atrincheró ahí».
languages.original_text: "It's one of the utility buildings. Fortunately, it was empty at the time of the attack — there were no potential hostages or innocent people inside. If you ask me, I think this was the first place the killer came to when he was beating his retreat. We managed to round up all the others, but this one holed himself up in there."

traits.locale_text: «Este es uno de los edificios de suministros. Por suerte, estaba vacío cuando tuvo lugar el atentado y no había potenciales rehenes o gente inocente dentro. En mi opinión, fue el primer sitio al que acudió el asesino tras poner pies en polvorosa. Pudimos acorralar a todos los demás, pero este se atrincheró ahí».

languages.text: "Es handelt sich um eines der Versorgungsgebäude. Zum Glück war es zum Zeitpunkt des Anschlags leer – keine potenziellen Geiseln oder andere Unschuldige. Wenn Ihr mich fragt, ich denke, das hier war die erste Anlaufstelle des Mörders bei seinem Rückzug. Alle anderen haben wir erwischt, aber er hat sich da drin verschanzt."
languages.original_text: "It's one of the utility buildings. Fortunately, it was empty at the time of the attack — there were no potential hostages or innocent people inside. If you ask me, I think this was the first place the killer came to when he was beating his retreat. We managed to round up all the others, but this one holed himself up in there."

traits.locale_text: "Es handelt sich um eines der Versorgungsgebäude. Zum Glück war es zum Zeitpunkt des Anschlags leer – keine potenziellen Geiseln oder andere Unschuldige. Wenn Ihr mich fragt, ich denke, das hier war die erste Anlaufstelle des Mörders bei seinem Rückzug. Alle anderen haben wir erwischt, aber er hat sich da drin verschanzt."

languages.text: « Il s'agit de l'un des bâtiments techniques. Heureusement, il était vide au moment de l'attaque ; personne ne risquait d'être pris en otage. À mon avis, c'est tout simplement le premier endroit que ce terroriste a trouvé quand il s'est enfui. Nous avons réussi à attraper tous les autres, mais celui-ci s'est retranché là-dedans. »
languages.original_text: "It's one of the utility buildings. Fortunately, it was empty at the time of the attack — there were no potential hostages or innocent people inside. If you ask me, I think this was the first place the killer came to when he was beating his retreat. We managed to round up all the others, but this one holed himself up in there."

traits.locale_text: « Il s'agit de l'un des bâtiments techniques. Heureusement, il était vide au moment de l'attaque ; personne ne risquait d'être pris en otage. À mon avis, c'est tout simplement le premier endroit que ce terroriste a trouvé quand il s'est enfui. Nous avons réussi à attraper tous les autres, mais celui-ci s'est retranché là-dedans. »

languages.text: "Kamu hizmeti binalarından biri. Neyse ki saldırı esansında boştu, içeride potansiyel bir rehine veya masum insanlar bulunmuyordu. Bana sorarsanız katil, kaçmaya çalışırken ilk bu binaya denk geldi. Diğerlerini toparlamayı başardık ama bu, kendini içeri kilitledi."
languages.original_text: "It's one of the utility buildings. Fortunately, it was empty at the time of the attack — there were no potential hostages or innocent people inside. If you ask me, I think this was the first place the killer came to when he was beating his retreat. We managed to round up all the others, but this one holed himself up in there."

traits.locale_text: "Kamu hizmeti binalarından biri. Neyse ki saldırı esansında boştu, içeride potansiyel bir rehine veya masum insanlar bulunmuyordu. Bana sorarsanız katil, kaçmaya çalışırken ilk bu binaya denk geldi. Diğerlerini toparlamayı başardık ama bu, kendini içeri kilitledi."
